text.div:
Pertussis (Tests for Bordetella pertussis Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    23826-1 Bordetella pertussis DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    43913-3 Bordetella pertussis DNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with probe detection
    80600-0 Bordetella pertussis.pertussis toxin promoter region [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with probe detection
    80601-8 Bordetella pertussis+parapertussis+bronchiseptica gidA gene [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with probe detection
    82179-3 Bordetella pertussis.pertussis toxin promoter region [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
    85360-6 Bordetella pertussis+bronchiseptica+holmesii IS481 DNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
    85799-5 Bordetella pertussis+bronchiseptica+holmesii IS481 DNA [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    86325-8 Bordetella pertussis+parapertussis ptxS1 gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    91815-1 Bordetella pertussis DNA [Presence] in Upper respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    91869-8 Bordetella pertussis DNA [Presence] in Throat by NAA with probe detection
    92128-8 Bordetella pertussis DNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    92857-2 Bordetella pertussis+bronchiseptica+holmesii IS481 DNA [Presence] in Lower respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    92858-0 Bordetella pertussis+bronchiseptica+holmesii IS481 DNA [Presence] in Upper respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
